## Bootstrap 5.3 Creating List Groups ### Introduction In this tutorial, we will learn how to create list groups using Bootstrap 5.3. List groups are a flexible and powerful way to display a series of content. They can be used to display a list of items, navigation menus, or even as a container for cards. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this tutorial is to provide step-by-step instructions on creating list groups using Bootstrap 5.3. We will cover the basic structure of a list group, different styling options, and how to add interactive features such as badges and checkboxes. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow along with this tutorial, you will need: - Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS - Bootstrap 5.3 installed in your project ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
